name: zJTAG
short_description:
zJTAG is based on BrJTAG, it supports TIAO parallel and USB jtag adapters.

zJTAG supports many routers including WRT54G and you can add support to other routers easily.
summary: zJTAG is an EJTAG Debrick Utility based on BrJTAG
